name: Verify Update Customer API updates user details successfully with different data -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends PUT request to update customer details with "Automation", "Update", "Test Automation Lead", "Test@123", and "+971508078631"
When the user receives the response from update customer API
Then the response should contain a message "User updated successfully"

fullName: Update Customer Details API: Verify Update Customer API updates user details successfully with different data
